ai-patthana12.3:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.3:2.1_0: You don’t have a teaching instigated,
ai-patthana12.3:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-patthana12.3:4.1_0: trying to peril with a teaching,
ai-patthana12.3:5.1_0: or he’s not able to teach the Dhamma.
ai-patthana12.3:6.1_0: not for striving; and for teaching, not for the sake of passion and for the teaching. ...
ai-patthana12.3:7.1_0: He should not give a teaching, nor by legitimate means,
ai-patthana12.3:8.1_0: One should not give a teaching to it, or to by its victors, or by its neck,
ai-patthana12.3:9.1_0: it’s not easy to teach and hard to teach.
ai-patthana12.3:10.1_0: You shouldn’t recite the teaching of the mass of pollutants. ...
ai-patthana12.3:10.1_1: for it’s not possible to teach the Dhamma for defilement.
